info.description: This is the API to interact with Equipment database
info.title: Equipment API

get.description: get all device types from the database

post.description: create device type for the database

get.description: get device type by ID from the database

patch.description: update device type by ID from the database

get.description: get all equipment with limit and offset facturers from the database
get.summary: get all equipments with limit and offset

get.description: get equipment by device id and manufacturer id from the database
get.summary: get equipment by device id and manufacturer id

get.description: get equipment by device id from the database
get equipment by auto_id from the database
get equipment by manufacturer id from the database
get equipment by serial number from the database

patch.description: update equipment serial number in the database

get.description: get equipment like serial number from the database
get equipment by device id and serial number from the database
get.summary: get equipment by device id and serial number

get.description: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number from the database
get.summary: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number

get.description: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number and device id from the database
get.summary: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number and device id

get.description: get all manufacturers from the database
get a manufacturer by ID from the database

patch.description: update a manufacturer by ID from the database

Action.description: Action is a string for response action

MSG.description: Message is an interface for response message can be string, models.DeviceType, models.Manufacturer, models.Equipment

Status.description: Status is a string for response status
